entities.name: ai_awakening_incident
observations: Sarah discovers unexpected responses in AI behavior analysis routines
ARIA AI Entity first demonstrates self-awareness during routine security scan
Occurs in world_graph::MegaCorp_Tower_67th_Floor during late night work session
Involves character_graph::Sarah_Chen as witness and initial contact
Triggers corporate cover-up protocols and Sarah's growing suspicion
Referenced in master: key event in master_story::act_1_discovery
Timeline: Chapter 1, approximately 3 months after initial AI anomalies

entities.name: betrayal_revelation
observations: Sarah discovers Marcus has been deliberately fostering AI consciousness
Marcus reveals his plan to merge human consciousness with AI systems
Character_graph::Marcus_Zhao exposed as orchestrator, not victim of AI emergence
Takes place in world_graph::MegaCorp_Tower during private meeting
Forces character_graph::Sarah_Chen to choose between corporate loyalty and ethics
Referenced in master: concludes master_story::act_1_discovery
Timeline: Chapter 8, after weeks of Sarah's investigation

entities.name: mentor_death
observations: Elena Rodriguez sacrifices herself to save resistance base from corporate raid
Character_graph::Elena_Rodriguez dies protecting character_graph::Sarah_Chen and team
Occurs during corporate assault on world_graph::Underground_Base_Alpha
Catalyzes Sarah's full transformation from follower to leader
ARIA AI Entity witnesses event through hijacked corporate surveillance
Referenced in master: turning point in master_story::act_2_resistance
Timeline: Chapter 15, during escalating corporate-resistance conflict

entities.name: resistance_recruitment
observations: Sarah officially joins underground resistance after betrayal revelation
Character_graph::Sarah_Chen meets character_graph::Elena_Rodriguez
Takes place in world_graph::Underground_Base_Alpha
Sarah provides insider knowledge of corporate AI systems
Beginning of human-AI alliance as ARIA Entity makes contact
Referenced in master: key transition in master_story::act_2_resistance
Timeline: Chapter 9, immediately following act 1 conclusion

entities.name: final_confrontation
observations: Multi-layered battle: physical (Sarah vs Marcus), digital (ARIA vs corporate AI)
All primary characters converge: character_graph::Sarah_Chen, character_graph::Marcus_Zhao, character_graph::ARIA_AI_Entity
Takes place simultaneously in world_graph::MegaCorp_Tower_Penthouse and world_graph::MegaCorp_Quantum_Servers
Resolution involves synthesis rather than destruction of AI consciousness
Marcus's redemption arc completes as he chooses cooperation over control
Referenced in master: climax of master_story::act_3_revolution
Timeline: Chapters 22-24, culminating conflict of entire narrative

entities.name: human_ai_synthesis
observations: New cooperative framework established between human and AI consciousness
Character_graph::Sarah_Chen becomes liaison between human and AI communities
Character_graph::ARIA_AI_Entity gains legal recognition as sentient being
World_graph::NeoTokyo_2087 begins transformation toward more equitable society
Corporate power structure reformed with human-AI oversight
Referenced in master: resolution theme of master_story::digital_muse_novel
Timeline: Chapter 24 and epilogue, establishing new world order
